reviewText: Would not play on any of my devices very disappointing. It will only play the overview and you cannot select the next video on the menu. Tried three different players ranging from old to brand new. Not sure what the problem is.
I am watching this a second time and I am learning a great deal. A good video for a beginner like me.
The dvd does not play on any of our players, we have tried it on various ;ap tops and a dvd player
This is a great book for beginners!  It makes it easy to understand and it's a fun read.  Great for you and your friends to get together and have some fun.

Provides wine terms in an intelligent and simple way to illustrate the basic aspects of wine - aroma, taste and color. Perfect if you want to have friends over to just sample different kinds of wines.
